item.title: Multi-CDN Resilience: Why Digital Leaders Can’t Rely on a Single Edge Provider
item.description: Multi-CDN Resilience: Lessons From Real Outages Earlier this year, I watched closely as Cloudflare experienced a major outage, and separately, Azure Front Door had a rough patch. These weren’t just technical headlines — teams around the world felt the impact on revenue, partner portals, and customer-facing applications. The takeaway is clear: relying on a single CDN is a single point of failure. Your digital infrastructure matters and ignoring this risk is no longer an option.
